column2: # Extract tidy summary and exponentiate (to get odds ratios)
coef_data <- tidy(model_polr, conf.int = TRUE, exponentiate = TRUE)
ggplot(coef_data, aes(x = term, y = estimate, ymin = conf.low, ymax = conf.high)) +
title = "Predictors of Tree Trend (Decreasing â†’ Increasing)",
caption = "Figure 1. Coefficient plot from an ordinal logistic regression model showing the effect of standardized plant traits on the probability of being in a higher Trend category.
Dashed line at OR = 1 indicates no effect; points represent odds ratios with 95% confidence intervals."
